justification: "In the dot-matrix task, participants are asked to remember a dot location in a grid while verifying the accuracy of equations"—the task is described as the procedure used to assess visuospatial span in working memory.

"Performance on this task is strongly correlated with performance on the Paper Folding Test, a spatial visualisation test where participants are asked to mentally fold a piece of paper…"—identifying the Paper Folding Test as the instrument for spatial-visualisation.
